item.title: Technology: The perfect USB cable tester does ~~n't~~ exist
item.description: As probably everyon reading this blog, I have a lot of USB cables. I want to sort and categorize them. What the cable can and cannot do is an important criteria. But how do I really learn what a cable supports? As I found out during this quest, your cable may successfully lie to your PC.
